main event: A UFO was sighted near Richmond, Virginia on August 7, 1952.
interesting points: The UFO was described as three circular brilliant white lights, about the size of a dime at arm's length, that moved at a high rate of speed in a westerly direction.
The objects were sighted for approximately 25 minutes before heading towards the horizon.
The observers, Lt. David M. Groner and 2nd Lt. Donald H. Ware, stated the only visible object was the distant planet Venus.
No jet trails or other aircraft were visible in the sky at the time of the sighting.
The case remained unresolved and the identity of the objects could not be explained in terms of known aircraft or astronomical phenomena.
witnesses: Lt. David M. Groner and 2nd Lt. Donald H. Ware
